document_data.name: ''Amulet of Misty Step''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''amulet of misty step''''' was a [[magical item]] from [[Menzoberranzan]] that allowed the wearer to readily ''[[teleport]]'' short distances. They were regarded as signifying status of high regard and often given as gifts to solicit favor.
document_data.Description:
[[File:Amulet of misty step 2.png|thumb|''Another depiction of an amulet of misty step.'']]
These necklaces were crafted using a number of vividly blue [[gem]]s unique to a single gem mine in the [[drow]] city of Menzoberranzan.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of one such necklace could readily ''[[misty step|transport themself]]'' over short distances in a moment's time.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Minthara Baenre]], Nightwarden of the [[cult of the Absolute]].
